thread.title: ECB Prepared to Beef Up Bond-Buying Program, Says Draghi
thread.title_full: ECB Prepared to Beef Up Bond-Buying Program, Says Draghi - WSJ

author: Brian Blackstone
title: ECB Prepared to Beef Up Bond-Buying Program, Says Draghi
text:
FRANKFURT—The European Central Bank is prepared to beef up its bond-buying program if inflation weakens more than currently expected, the bank’s president Mario Draghi said Wednesday.
“Should some of the downward risks weaken the inflation outlook over the medium term more fundamentally than we project at present, we would not hesitate to act,” Mr. Draghi said in testimony to European parliament in Brussels.
“The asset... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
